series.title: Weekend Service

episodes.title: Weekend Service
episodes.shortDescription: Cornerstone Fellowship tries to help everyone to take their Next Step with Jesus.
episodes.longDescription: Cornerstone Fellowship is a church in the San Francisco East Bay with 5 physical locations and a thriving online community. Our mission is to help everyone to take their Next Step with Jesus.
